lines.text: War... War never changes.
Where were the mutants coming from?
Everywhere! Hell, seemed like you couldn't fart without hitting one. But mostly in the northwest.
You farted Northwest?

[laughs]
Pretty good... Noo...
Your presence means?
Ran out of butt to kick and thought of your face.
I've heard of you. You're the one that took out Gizmo over in Junktown. Killian must have paid you a good sum for that job. Are you here for some work, maybe?
Work for this dump? You've got to be joking.
I hope for your sake that was an attempt at humor. Do not cross us, you will regret it.
Yeah, Whatever, tough guy.
I don't think you understood me. Let me clarify. If you don't watch your manners, you'll find yourself dead, tough guy.
No, let me clarify - if you don't watch it, I'll be wearing your ass for a shoe.
Ever dance with the devil in the pail moonlight?
What do you want?
To see a valley filled with my enemies' heads mounted on spears. A silent valley, except for the wind whistling through their ears.

The Unity will bring above the master race. Master Master! One able to survive, or even thrive, in the wasteland. As long as there will be differences, we will tear ourselves apart fighting each other. We need one race! Race! Race! One goal! Goal! Goal! One people... to move forward to our destiny. Destiny.
How did you survive?
Didn't. Got killed...
[laughs then coughs]
God, I love that joke.
Yeah, I can tell.
You think you can destroy me destroy me?
Now what the Uncle Sam-hell do you think you're doing here?
Oh, this is your place?
You're damn straight this is my place! Now get the hell out before I make your head a wall decoration!
You? Wake up, pal, you're still dreaming.
Oh this is excellent you know I actually doubted my officers when they said they'd captured a prime normal it is so nice to see you.
Go to hell!
There better be a killer reason for you standing in my shadow normie does next on the menu ring a bell?
The name's Killian. Killian Darkwater. I'm the mayor of this fine town. And who might you be?
What's it to you?
Oh, you obviously have me confused with someone who has to take your lip. Why don't you come back when your mama teaches you some manners.
You mean kill them?
All a matter of semantics, but yes kill them.
Wow, you're pretty smart for a ghoul.
What is that? Sucking up? Listen, walker, I don't do the deal with norms, so blowing smoke up the tail ain't going to get you head seat at the table.
I'm here to kick ass and chew bubble gum I'm all out of gum.
Get your butt in here and sit down. We have some buisness to discuss
Looks like there's enough butt in here already...
We are the one and only Junktown gang. We have the run of the streets, and we rule the streets at night.
You couldn't run the schoolyard, Chromo
What? You'll pay for that remark!
Who are doing here? And what is this place?

What does it look like? I'm a guard and I'm keeping an eye out for strangers like you. And this place is called Junktown. Hey dont laugh. I happen to like the name myself. We mostly do trading. Sometimes we trade with those stuck up bastards from the Hub. Hey, you're not from the Hub are you?
What? The Hub? Sure I am!
Then you must know most of the rules. Have a good day. And I'm sorry about the bastards past,OK.
It's gonna cause me some severe mental trauma. Later.
I know who you are. You are walking death, a plague in human form. Where you step, blood flows like a river. But such iniquities can be ended by a righteous soul!
How dare you enter my sanctuary with a weapon in your hand! Oaf! Get out!
You don't like drawn weapons? You're gonna hate what I do with it next!
I don't like your attitude. I'm going to have to ask you to leave.
Attitude? I'l show you attitude!

Well, if it isn't a potential customer! I'm Lorenzo the Munificent, at your service. I give out loans. Only ten percent daily interest, a maximum of ten days to repay. You won't find a more generous lending institution anywhere in the Hub!
You sound like a rip-off artist to me!
Guido, Leone, why don't you show him what ripping off really means. Start with his arms.
Me have trouble thinking, too... what we talk about?
We were talking about how stupid you are.

I instruct the children. It is my duty. All children are wicked beasts. It is my duty to force them into evolve into human beings. Perhaps you have heard that I do not tolerate frivolity. This is true. I want my charges to suffer as much as possible.
Once more into the breach, my friend.
Hello, stranger. You look like you're new here. What's your name?
My name's not important.
Well, then, neither are you.
What the hell do you think you're doing? Izo tear his arms off!
Life in the vault is about to change.
You want to join us, huh? How do we know you're tough enough to be a Skul?
Trust me, I'm tough enough.
What do you want?
I need to ask you a few questions.
Time is money. Chit-chat is not money. You here about the job or what?
Here for the what or the money?

Hi! I was afraid that you were gone and I wasn't going to get a chance to thank you for rescuing me. Aw! That was great! Action, adventure... Anyway, if there's anything that I can do for you, you just ask.
How about you and I... well, you know... get together.
I'm not that kind of girl, mister. Go find a Brahma or something.
Ride my bullet son!
What in the hell do you want?
Who's in charge here!
Sure as hell ain't you punk.
What in the hell do you want?
Where might I find the master?
In hell loser.
Spare change, old friend, old pal? Can you help a poor mutant down on his luck?
[cough]
Keep away from me!
Well, I was a trader. Did pretty good making a circuit between survivors. Lost a lotta good people, though.
[coughs]
How?
Gangers got'em. Scavengers attacking the caravans. And mutants, son of a dog, if they weren't springing up like rabbits with a mission.
[cough]
Had to have an army of guards with, just to do a deal.
Didn't the guards help?
Course they helped, ya bonehead! Just too damn many to handle!
Quite pleased to make your acquaintance actually... for now. Let's get the other bit of politeness taken care of, shall we? What the bloody, bloody, bloody hell are you doing here!
You talk like an idiot.
It's a little gift from me Da and Mum. Actually, a few generations before that. Do you like it?
No, it hurts my ears
Leave me or die!
I just wanted to compliment you on the great looking hump on your back. Your breath could use some work, though...
Get out of my face, you son of a bitch!
So what do you want me to do?
Simple. Find out who's doing it, and tell me. Or take 'em out. It makes no damn difference to me. Just get that job done!
Any clues on who's doing this?
Well there's uh... something, but I never listen to those rumors.
Well, I do. What is it?
You uh... you really want to hear it, huh? Well, some say it's the Death Claw, but... but I don't know nothin' about that.
You sound scared.
Listen you, I ain't scared. I'm... cautious. You'd be stupid not to be, with the Death Claw. Go talk to Beth, she'll tell ya more.
Yep, you're as scared as a whipped dog.
I'm tired of your insults you... you pinhead! Don't come back! Rutger, take this annoying bug away!
Well, I found out who's taking the caravans.
Really? Who?
It's these big mutant guys.
What, do I look a crate shy of a load? Did you even see the Death Claw?
Been there, saw that, killed it.
You... you killed it? Well... I uh... um... uh, where did these mutants come from?
I don't know yet. But they have an outpost in the mountains.
An outpost? Well... um... well uh. I'll have to talk to the Committee. Yeah... yeah, they'll know what to do. Done and done. Get out, 'cause I got stuff to do... okay?
What do you want with me?
The mind simply boggles at your intellect. Why the legions haven't bowed down at your feet by now, I'll never understand. Guards, take this idiot away!
Ah, I feel much better. And you?... Now, be a good little human and tell me where your Vault is. This is getting most tedious.
Go to hell.
I do so admire your will. Guards, take him back to his cell and get him ready for dipping. He'll tell us where his Vault is when he is one of us.
Moo, I say.
Hey! You not look like ghoul. How come?
Let me guess... because I'm not a ghoul?
You not ghoul! I knew, I knew! Not fool Harry!
You're right. And now that you know, I'll have to kill you.
Lou tell me watch place. Not let no one in. Not normals most. Take normals to the Lou. Hey...
But I'm not a normal!
Ooo... Harry confused. You not ghoul. You not normal. Hmm, what you?
[Mumbling]
Can I help you stranger?
Can you give me the big picture on Junktown?

Me and my men work for Killian Darkwater. We keep some order in this town, dealing with all kinds of the murderers, thieves, and other scumbags who come in from the desert. If you want my advice, you'll also stay away from Gizmo. That fathead runs a crooked operation, but we just haven't been able to prove anything. He and his lockeyes the Skulz, are going to take the fall sometime soon, if Killian has anything to say about it.
What a bummer, No fun here at all.
Look, buddy my job here is to keep the peace, and if I have to break a few heads to do it, then a few people are going to be hurting. So just watch it.
Listen thanks for saving my life. It's a mighty brave thing to do. Looks like we got ourselves a situation here. I know Gizmo's behind this, but I need proof. You interested in helpin'?
What do you want? I'm a busy man.
I'm here to talk about the attempt on Killian's life.
I don't know what you're talking about.
You're a liar!
You know
[Gizmo Sighs]
I don't like it when people insult me in my own place. Izo, escort our guest out... through the window.
Harry think he beat your head now.
Would you like a flower mister?
Sure, I could get off on stomping it to pieces!
Yeah, what do you want? It better be good.
Do you run this joint?
No.
Nice answer moron. Who's in charge?
Do you have any idea who you are talking to? For your sake I hope not, I don't 'run' the Maltese Falcon but I AM the one in charge. What do you want before I lose my temper?
I know who you are and trust me, you 'are' a moron.
Sir, you are injured. I can treat you if you wish. I am a healer
How Much?
I am a healer, not a money lender. The cathedral sees to my needs. So I might see to the needs of others. Now let me see your injury, shall we?
Forget it. If you were any more of a quack, you'd be swimming in a pond.
Who are you? And who let you in?
I have a message from a friend.
I have no friends. What is your message?
Um... Bob sent me... oh... he said you overpaid him 100 caps and sent me to give it to you.
I don't know any Bob, but I'll take the 100 caps and you can leave.
Uhh... That *bastard* Bob didn't give me enough caps! I'll get 'em for you Mr. Hightower, honest I will!
Leon, show this fool the door! Come back again, and my guards will have your head!
You're not from around here. Who're you?
I might ask the same of you.
You might, but you're on my home turf, not vice-versa. So put up or shut up.
I may not be a very good fighter any more, but I'm good enough to best the likes of you!
Whoa, not so fast. We never finished introductions, remember? What's your name, stranger?
None of your business, you nut.
Now, now, no need to get impolite. But with that attitude you'd best be on your way.
Bite me.
Thousand caps. No more, no less.
You call that a reward? If I'm to whack the guy, I'm going to need more than that.

[Gizmo laughs and coughs]
Maybe you're right. I think you're worth more. 1500.
That's about what, a dollar a pound for you? Forget it.
You don't leave town, you end up under it. You got me?
Who's going to do that? You? You couldn't get off your fat butt to get a sandwich, much less kill me.
So, did you get the evidence?
I sure did.
Which, bug or tape?
That's the first time I've been happy to hear his voice. Thanks, friend. Now, time for you and me to take care of the other business.
Well, thanks again. Oh, listen, I'm gonna take the guards and run Gizmo and his cronies out of town. I could use another gun. You up for it? Might be good for a laugh.
Sure. It'll be worth it just to see him try to walk more than ten feet.
Go to Lars at the guard station. He'll fill you in. And listen, this town owes you... a lot.

Ahh, you're here. Good. We've got a problem. A big one. The controller chip for our water purification system has given up the ghost. Can't make another one and the process is too complicated for a work around system. Simply put, we're running out of drinking water. No water, no Vault. This is crucial to our survival. And frankly, I... I think you're the only hope we have. You need to go find us another controller chip. We estimate we have four to five months before the Vault runs out of water. We need that chip. We marked your map with the location of another Vault. Not a bad place to start I think. Look, just be safe, OK?
What do you want?
What's this place about?
Something called a Holy Flame. Don't listen to this bullshit it will rot your brain!
Man, are these people ever stupid!
Yeah. It's a good thing they aren't paying me to agree with them Holy Flame. My ass!
Spare change, old friend, old pal? Can you help a poor mutant down on his luck?
[cough]
Yeah, here's a $25. Good luck to you
Oh, kind of ya friend. Very kind. You know, if I could clear the gunk out of there, you just might find a tear in Old Harold's eye.
Why is that?

[cough]
Rest of the Hubber's been picking on me like a bad booger since I came to town. I can't leave, though. When the deals are done
[wheez]
it's still my home.
Who are the Hubbers?
You're in the Hub, right? People who live in the Hub? Hubbers. Get it?
[cough]
Sheesh! Thanks for the help and good luck... think you're gonna need it.
You'd better put that away. Junktown is a friendly place, friend, and we want to keep it that way.
Put what away?
Your weapon, idiot. Killian won't take your arms away, but you'd better damn well keep them in your holster.
This is Junktown. Nice place to live, as long as you stay on our good side.
You seem well educated. What are you doing here?
Doc Morbid in Junktown taught me some. And just because we live in stone huts, does not mean we are less intelligent or educated. Have a nice day.
So where is this Master?
He's busy with the Children of the Cathedral. They actually consider us gods. But then, who can blame them.
So what's the quest?
You have to go to the ruins of the Ancient Order. That's south of here. Uh, you've gotta go inside and bring back something that proves that you were there.
No way in hell.
Now what do we have here? I've been told you wish to divulge information of the utmost importance. I do hope so.
On one condition.
Conditions? How delightful. Go ahead, amuse me with your... condition.
Put a bag over your head so I can stand being in your presence.
I can't win. I'll join you.
Excellent. Your talents will be useful. But first, you must tell me everything about your Vault.
Why?
I will conquer it and turn all those pure strain humans into mutants. They will give me the army I need to bring peace to the entire wasteland.
Sorry, I don't like that plan much.
So be it. You've dug your own grave. Grave! Grave!
Master! I shouldn't have said anything. I heard the Nightkin crying an felt sorry for it.
What is evil? Evil is when good gets completely screwed up! Evil is when brave people can't be brave anymore! Evil is an anagram of vile! There's got to be a moral standard somewhere!
Shut up, asshole! Moral standards? It sure as hell ain't here!
Who is the master?
You know, the Nightkin say that he is uglier than they are. That must mean he is one hideous son of a bitch
He's the man! The man with the plan! He plans because he loves us! And if the world gets his way, screw it! Because that's what love is all about.
Love is what makes the Cactus grow! Love is what makes the brahmin moo! Love is screwing, it's screwing your life! I hate love, I love hate! If the Master hated us, we'd be allright!
I would like to give your master a bit of information about my vault.
I do not have a master, you imbecile!
Then what do you call the master? Doesn't he control you?
No one controls me. He and I are... partners.
I am Set. Why do you tread my shadow?
I am the bringer of death. Fall to your knees and beg for mercy... Or give me a sandwich, I'm pretty hungry.
Well... how do you like our little town? Bored yet?
Hell yes, there's nothing to do here but watch the brahmin mate.
Finally! Someone else who sees! Of course, you've probably been everywhere, so this must be hell for you.
A robot crane crashed into us. Last I saw of Grey, he was flying through the air into some sort of acid bath. I was in bad shape and... well I passed out.
And you never saw Grey again?
No, you idiot. I just told you I never saw him again didn't I?
Why do you disturb an elder of the cathedral?
I'm interested in your church, and I want some information. Do you have any pamphlets?
Continue to mock me and I will have you thrown out.
It's obvious that kindness and good temper aren't part of this religion.
You will pay for those heretical words.
Are you a child?
Lady, do I look that young to you?
Mocking our holy cause is not appreciated. You will be punished if you continue.
And who's going to do the punishing? Ooh, I'd like to request the extra hard whip, if you don't mind.
I'm cleansing the world of all that is evil!
That's quite nice of you, but 'evil' is very subjective. What or who you might consider to be evil could very well be the opposite to someone else.
That's ridiculous. What's evil is evil. Anyone who says otherwise is just stupid.
A blind fanatic is a dangerous person indeed. I hope your stay here in the hub is not long. We don't take kindly to murders that aren't auth... to murders of any sort. Good day.
What's up with these cathedral guys?
I been trying to get a good read on these guys for weeks. At first I thought they were fools, but now... I ain't so sure. They're organized, and they've got a plan. I can smell it!
What do you want?
You wouldn't know where I could find a water chip?
Water chip? Do you mean like ice chips? Up in the mountains, maybe.
Not that kind of chip, you moron!
Watch your mouth, asshole. These people may believe in peace and love, but I don't.
Are you the leader of this gang?
Gang? We're hardly a gang. But I am the leader here.
Well, you look like a gang to me.
I wish we were a gang. At least then we'd have decent weapons to defend ourselves with.
Well, you're not foolin' me. You're all just a bunch of degenerates and I think you're up to no good.
What do you want?
A doughnut.
We don't appreciate wise guys here. Buzz off
What do you want?
A doughnut.
That joke wasn't even funny the first time. You're about to discover why I'm one of the most fearsome bounty hunters in the wasteland. And I won't even get paid for it.
I don't like your attitude, old man
I might just ignore that remark if you've come here to solve my problem for me.
What, that you're old and stupid?
What is the Brotherhood of Steel all about anyway?
The Brotherhood is a collective if men and women who have dedicated their lives to the preservation of technology.
I've heard that you people sacrifice puppies.
Sacrifice puppies! Where the hell did you hear that one? Don't believe everything you hear in the wastes they're all a bunch of pathetic lunatics.
Everyone is a lunatic outside the Brotherhood of Steel?
Yes... a... well... a... No. It's just people don't even try to understand what we're all about.
Well?... I think you guys might be a little kookie myself.
Greetings. Hey! We're very glad you could join us. We hope that you have found our humble abode to your satisfaction.
'Humble' is a good word. 'Dump' would be better.
Hey! I don't appreciate that, but I'll overlook it if you apologize.
I'm sorry I ever talked to you.

[On vault 13]
Heard about some of these places before, but never been in one. Seems nice and clean... a little too clean for my taste.
You don't look like much of a fighter.
Insolent pup. Apologize now and you'll not be hurt.
What, by you?
Each one of these marks is for a past attempt on Hightower's life. I bagged each and ever one of them. Tell me... do you know what this fool Decker hired looks like?
No
Thank you for the advance warning, but Mr. Hightower dosen't like strangers hangin' around. I'm going to have to ask you to leave.
That's it? No reward? What the hell is wrong with you people?
So it comes down to this, Killian. Well, I never could put up with your stink, and now I'm gonna put an end to it!
I'm here to take you in, Gizmo. This time, I've got the proof I need.
So. You're looking for a job. How fortunate, I have one that needs doing. Ahh, but where are my manners? Whats your name?
What buisness is it of yours?
Everything is my buisness in the Hub. Either tell me, or you may leave.
I'm not telling you anything.
Your life is in danger, and I need to speak with you.
Tell me something I don't know , you moron!
Moron? I was trying to help you. You can go to Hell.
Of course. But fist I need to know why you want him dead.
Huh. That's easy. I want him dead because he cramps my buisness. So, will you do him for me?
Could you say that again please... this time in my coat pocket?
What's there to do around here?
Oh, we go tons to do. The Skum Pitt's on the east side, by the enterance. Great drinkin' place. Gizmo's is near there. And if your hurtin', Doc Morbid's your man.
That's all there is to do around here?
Well, if we're too fast for ya, just pass on by, pal. It is pal, ain't it?
Then there won't be anything exciting in town.
You're back! And in one piece! How goes the search?
Not good, but I noticed the radiation count is low. Why don't we just move the people out of the vault?

We've debated this before. You ought to know now, after being out there! You think the rest of us could survive that? Besides, I'd be out of a job! I'm management! It's not like I know how to do anything useful!
We agree on that.
Who are the Elders?
Well you see there's four of them and that's about all they can ever agree on. They can't even agree if they want to piss, much less pick a pot to piss in.
Could you tell me about the Brotherhood's history.
Well, it's good to see someone interested in our great history. Unlike other around here. Here you go. This is a disk of some of our earliest writings.
I don't care about this crap. Thank's for nothing.
Brahmin sure do shi... uh, poop a lot.
Heard any good rumors?
I do not put stock in rumors?
Oh, come on, just one? Please?
No.
Oh come on, pretty please?
o you not hear? I will not say it again!
Some members of the Brotherhood might be offended if a stranger... I mean, a new Initiate... approaches them with a weapon.
Can I help you?
Yes. I'm here to see Mr. Hightower.
Mr. Hightower dosen't see just anyone.
I'm not just anyone, you idiot!
Ok. Go on in.
What do you do here?

[Saul laughs heartily]
. Why, I am a boxer!
Ah, I could kick your ass.
You again? Geez, some people just don't learn!
Just stopped in for a quick drink.
Not a bad idea. Think I'll have one myself. OF course, you always have to wash a beer down with some bloodshed!
Ah, I feel muh better. And you?... Now, be a good little human and tell me where your Vault is. This is getting most tedious.
Go to hell.
I do so admire your will. Guards, take him to his cell and prepare him for the dipping. He'll tell us where his Vault is when he is one of us.
If you're so sure I'll tell after dipping, then why all of this?
Well, you see, there is this minor drawback. Sometimes, not always, a person's memory is, um... how shall we say, interrupted by dipping. SO there is a small chance you'll forget the location.
Looks like we're both screwed.
That's it! Don't come any closer. I'll off her. I swear.
There is no need for violence. Let's talk about this.
What world do you live in? Out here in the real would, blood flows, man. Blood flows, and it's gonna spill all over this room if you don't get out of here.
Mr. Hightower is not taking any visitors. Now leave!
I really need to speak to Mr. Hightower.
Whatever it is, you can tell me. Mr. H is busy right now.
I would much rather tell him in person. It's a matter of life and death.
You can tell me, or you can leave.
Look, I'm not tellin' you a damn thing!
Hey, fresh bait! So, what brings you in to our territory, chum? Here for a little fun? At your expense, of course.
Just stopped by for a drink and some... entertainment.
Well, fo this evening's entertainment, we've decided to thrash this place! Heh. Grab what you can carry and let's see some blood run, eh?
Nah, I'd rather have something to eat... perhaps grilled shark!
Thank you for what you did. No one ever took care of me like that before.
I can really take care of you later.
Is that all you can think about? Geez. Some people.
Who's in charge of this hole?
Hole? How dare you talk like that about the Brotherhood. You are a member of our order now, and should be proud to be a member of the Brotherhood of Steel.
Proud? Why? You're all just a bunch of robotic hop-heads, hiding from the real world. There's nothing to be pround of there.
I have not seen you around here before, are you lost? May I be of service?
If I was lost I would' be asking an idiot like you for help!
You bitch!
[Punches Trish she falls to the ground]

[Gets up and runs]
Oh! Saul, where are you?

[Pulls out gun and shoots and kills Skul Gang Member]
Get the hell outta here you goddamn punks! If any of ya ever touch her again I'll kill the whole lot o' ya!
We'll be back, old man. This isn't over.
New blood. Heh. Heh Heh.
You're not a very happy person, are you?
Why do you say that? I'm quite happy. I'm very happy because there are lots of things that bleed.
You're a real sicko, you know that?
Don't say that! My mother said that! I'll make you pay! I'm a good boy, right mommy?
Hey there! How are you doin'? The name's Demetre, Demetre Romara, head of the best damn caravan in the wastes. Are you lookin' for a job? Damn! You look like you could lift a mountain!
What's it to you?

That's just what we're lookin' for! You like the thrill and excitement of battle don't you? Bullets flying everywhere, whippin' by your head, blowin' your enemy in two, seein' the fear in their eyes! Ahhhh, that's the life! You look like the kind of person that could serve us well, and we pay well! Oh yes, we do! We've just had a few new openin's, if you are interested; but of course you are, right?
What's the pay?

We pay 600 hub bucks a job! That's each way! Hell, people say we take all the dangerous routes but I say they're the most excitiin'! You need a little excitement in your life, am I right? Of course I am!
Do you always talk so loud?
What, are you afraid of loud noises or somethin'?
No, but my ears were getting a little sore.
You're a smart little ass, are you? Well, it dosen't matter to me! Just as long as you defend the caravans I'll be satisfied. Go talk to Keri in the next room if you want a job.
I say you just use brute force. It don't take that much to bust a knee cap.
Give me a break. Anyone can bust a knee or break fingers. It just don't have the shock people like is used to.
Who cares about shock value? We ain't artists we're professionals. Uh, Leone, someone's trying to talk to us. Aren't we supposed to kill them if they do that?
Not until the boss says so. Just ignore him and he'll go away.
I am Gwen. I'm one of Garl's advisors. Who are you?
I am the one who will sweep you off your feet, honey.
If that is the best you can do, then I will be doing the world a favor by killing you.
Uh, what service's do you offer, exactly?

Why, I manage the care for perddy much all of the Caravan's wagons and Brahmin in these parts. If they ever need anything for their caravans, I'm the one they talk to. Hell, the Big Three Deal with me exclusively.
Who are the Big Three?

Damn, son. Have ya' been locked up all yer life in a cave or somethin'? The Big Three are the three largest Merchant groups in the world. Well, okay, maybe not the world, but they sure as hell cover a large portion; 'bout as far as yer eye can see.
Damn yourself, you brahmin freak.

Brahmin freak? Is that an attempt at insult'n me? I would be a little more polite to he people ya' meet stranger. I could care less, but this city is filled with all sorts of cutthroats that wouldn't hesitate to slit yer throat if ya look at'm wrong.
Damn, you're one ugly son of a bitch!
Well at least I don't have a mutated hind for a face. Yer mother must have been a brahmin and yer daddy a ra; that's the only way ya' could have come out so damn ugly. Hell yer uglier than me!
No one talks about my mother like that! Prepare to die!
Yeah right, that's an okay line, but everyone uses it. Yer kiddin' right? Ya' wouldn't lay a hand on poor ol' Dan.
Line? Hand? You wish. I'll lay much more than my hand on your soon to be dead carcass.
I have a crime to report!
Really? I, uh, you should talk to the Sheriff. I can't leave my post right now. I've got to... uh, fend off raiders that might come. Plus, I'm not very good with reports.
Does the Master really want peace or does he just want killing?
Who cares? I get to eat well, sleep in peace and kill some of the people who used to screw me over. You want something more from life?
I want sex and violence, without the sex. You know where I can get it?
You talk to Morpheus or to Lasher, or you can bother Ton, and Ton give you more violence than you can handle.
What's a nice girl like you doing in a place like this?
Uh heh... Waiting desperately for someone to use that pathetic line on me.
Hey darling, how are you doing?
Just fine, but I could be better.
Maybe I can help you with that.
I woudn't let my dog touch you.
I am looking for a water chip.
Well, in my studies I have come across some references to such things. Actually I have in my possession a Holodisk that contains a certain amount of information that you might find useful.
Can I have the Holodisk?
Information is hard to come by in this day and age. I will need to charge you 750 Hub bucks for the disk.
How about I take a blowtorch to this whole place instead! Huh lady?
Did ya finish the job yet?
Yep, sure did.
Then give me the dog tags.
What if I don't want to give them to you?
No problem, I take them off your dead body.
Anything you know about Water Chips that you can tell me?
So, you think I might know a little more about those Water Chip things huh? Well, you might be right. It's gonna' cost you, though. I think 500 bottle caps oughta' do it.
I think you need to tell me, right now, and without the freakin' caps!
Ok, Ok, Ok, see I was just kidding about paying for the info. Good joke, huh?

[On Seth]
Seth is the captain of the guards. Between you and me, he couldn't guard a fruit if it was nailed to his leg.

[On Necropolis]
This place gives me the creeps.
Excuse me while I gloat...
There is a bad place where the bad mutants come from. It is bad. Vault is good. Please, go destroy bad place.
I am Alya of the Khans. How might I help you today?
Why has your band of raiders attacked Shady Sands?
We do not attack those of Shady Sands. We are from the same place they are. It is only right that they share with us!
But you are hurting their livestock and terrifying them.
You sound just as wimpy as they are. Look, if they were in any trouble of starvation, then it is their fault for not planning ahead. Consider what we do a trade in talents.
A trade in talents? How can this be a trade in talents? You don't give them anything.
We give them the most important thing possible. We give their dreary lives excitement.
I think I will make their lives boring again. I'll start with you!

[on The Glow]
Wow. I wish I had a hot dog and a really long stick.
Greetings, and welcome to the Brotherhood of Steel.
Do you know where I can find a Water Chip?
No... I never even heard of one of those. One of our head scribes may know. Maybe you can ask one of them. That is if you join us.
You guys don't know jack.
You got something to say, say it fast.
I want to speak with whoever's in charge here.
That's Morpheus. Our Leader. He's up in the tower, I think.
C'mon, man. That tells me nothing. Share some of the dirt!

The guy dresses in black, he does his preacher act, then he goes upstairs and counts his scripts. Man, I wish I had it that easy! But I better stop talking about him behind his back, or the nightkin might here.
What are you afraid of?

You gotta be joking. The Nightkin are killers. You look at them the wrong way, and they'll cut off your body parts, cook 'em, and feed them to you a piece at a time. They can't be killed. They're the Master's enforcers and they're gonna tear apart the world for him. And I ain't saying nothing else!
What is your problem, asshole? Maybe I put you to sleep, shithead!
I snooze, you lose, asshole!
I'm shaking, asshole! Now, you wanna get well or not?
Damn straight I do. There's gotta be a real doctor around this place.
You little asshole! Who do you think you are to bother Dr. Wu? Stupid shithead!
You. Vanished our water processor chip. Exchanged it... for your life!
Want it back?
For the chip, you may walk.
Gotcha! I don't have it anymore!
Your price is to belong to Necropolis forever.
King of expensive. How 'bout I remove you from office instead?
I killed you!
Yes, you did. I've come back to haunt you.
I don't believe it! I can't believe it!
Believe this buddy, and you're about to join me in Hell!
What the hell do you want?
To be away from you.
Is there a shorter version of this story?
I like telling it my way. Short version will cost you 25 extra, friend. Which will it be?
How about neither, you old fart?
Well, whatta'ya got for me?
What was I supposed to do again?
Find out who's stealing my caravans. Money, big. You fail, hurt, big. Understand? Now get outta here!
I don't want any trouble. If you want to do business then let's do it. If not, get out.
You can go to hell. I go where I want, when I want!
Hello again. I hope you are doing well. Is there anything I can help you with?
Don't you ever go to sleep?

Well, I take catnaps when you are not around. Besides, I find the desert air very invigorating and healthy. And I never tire of looking at the stars. Can you imagine never seeing the night sky for you entire life?
[She pauses and looks at you]
Oh, I guess you can.
